maigheach air bruthach a hare on a slope –
Bha Màiri agus Seumas anns a’ mhonadh an dé. [...] Leum maigheach a mach as an fheur agus ruith i gu luath suas a’ bhruthach.
Mary and James were on the moor yesterday. [...] A hare jumped out of the grass and it ran swiftly up the slope. td. 76
